Room.Name: Hermit's Storage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a narrow, dark tunnel which Xandaus uses for storage purposes.
Room.LongDescription: Wooden boxes and chests with contents unknown are neatly stack on one side of the tunnel, while on the other side, a large oak rack supports the weight of numerous potion bottles and vials. Despite the organization of the items, everything seems to be covered in dust.
